tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_fixed_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_fixed_texts AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, CAST('constant' as varchar(10)) as constant, aav.approval_status, (CASE WHEN aav.approval_status='edited' THEN 2 WHEN aav.approval_status='approved' THEN 1 WHEN aav.approval_status='rejected' THEN 6 WHEN aav.approval_status='startedapproved' THEN 3 WHEN aav.approval_status='started' THEN 4 WHEN aav.approval_status='not_approved' THEN 5 ELSE 999999999 END) as approval_status_key,
aav.amp_id, aav.gov_agreement_number, aav.budget_code_project_id,CAST(aav.draft as varchar(5)) as draft, aav.fy, aav.vote, aav.subvote, aav.subprogram, aav.project_code, aav.ministry_code, aav.cris_number, aav.prj_implementation_unit, aav.proposed_project_life,
aav.original_comp_date, to_char(aav.original_comp_date, 'J')::integer AS original_comp_date_code,
aav.contracting_date, to_char(aav.contracting_date, 'J')::integer AS contracting_date_code,
aav.disbursments_date, to_char(aav.disbursments_date, 'J')::integer AS disbursments_date_code,
aav.proposed_start_date, to_char(aav.proposed_start_date, 'J')::integer AS proposed_start_date_code,
aav.actual_start_date, to_char(aav.actual_start_date, 'J')::integer AS actual_start_date_code,
aav.proposed_approval_date, to_char(aav.proposed_approval_date, 'J')::integer AS proposed_approval_date_code,
aav.actual_approval_date, to_char(aav.actual_approval_date, 'J')::integer AS actual_approval_date_code,
aav.actual_completion_date, to_char(aav.actual_completion_date, 'J')::integer AS actual_completion_date_code,
aav.proposed_completion_date, to_char(aav.proposed_completion_date, 'J')::integer AS proposed_completion_date_code,
aav.date_created, to_char(aav.date_created, 'J')::integer AS date_created_code,
aav.date_updated, to_char(aav.date_updated, 'J')::integer AS date_updated_code
FROM amp_activity_version aav;
